flawed_nl_solution:
If Susie puts 1/5*200 = $<<1/5*200=1000>>1000 more in her piggy bank.
The total amount of money in Susie's piggy bank will increase to $200+$1000=$1200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 1000. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
